author: senh
title: Winter Olympics 2022: Beijing chosen to stage Games
text: BING NEWS: Beijing Chosen to Host 2022 Winter Olympics The victory means Beijing will become the first city to stage both a summer and winter Olympics. It hosted the 2008 Summer Olympics, often billed as a coming of age moment for China. Beijing’s bid for the 2022 Olympics raised eyebrows as the city isn’t ... 07/31/2015 - 1:02 am | View Link Beijing to host 2022 Winter Olympics Kuala Lumpur: Beijing was chosen by the International Olympic ... the facilities in place after hosting the 2011 Asian Winter Games.
